name: Poker (pokerws)
description:
Host a Texas Hold'em Poker game for up to 8 players over the Internet. Share the game code to invite friends. Configure game length, blinds, starting stacks, re-buys and optional timed blind raises.

Keyboard Controls
  • Use arrow keys and enter to navigate menus
  • Press Escape to access options/emotes/sit-out menu
  • Hold left-shift to expand log and use up/down arrow keys to scroll back
  • Shortcut keys for actions: C to check/call. F to fold. N to sit-out.
Touchscreen Controls
  • You can launch any of the Desktop versions in touchscreen mode using the --touchscreen command line argument.
  • Tap your cards to access options/emotes/sit-out menu
